abstracts.cdata!:
The main objectives of the project are:
            (a) strengthening planning capability in the forestry
            sector; (b) reducing constraint of skilled manpower in the
            sector; (c) improving the management of existing forest
            plantations and establishing new plantations on a limited
            scale to meet projected industrial wood shortages; and (d)
            strengthening research and trial programs to improve sector
            productivity. The project would include the following major
            components: (a) a forestry master plan, including a
            five-year investment program; (b) forestry training; (c)
            industrial wood plantations; and (d) technical assistance.
